alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 15 at 7:35PM CST until December 15 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR ADAIR...CHARITON...RANDOLPH...LINN...EASTERN SULLIVAN...EASTERN PUTNAM...CENTRAL CARROLL...SCHUYLER...NORTH CENTRAL SALINE AND MACON COUNTIES... At 734 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Centerville to 7 miles south of Greencastle to near Brookfield to near Bosworth, moving northeast at 80 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS FOR NORTHERN MISSOURI. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Moberly, Macon, Brookfield, Carrollton, Marceline, Unionville, Salisbury, Huntsville, La Plata, Lancaster, Brunswick, Bevier, Green City, Queen City, Keytesville, Bucklin, Novinger, Greentop and Atlanta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across northern Missouri. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
